title: What type of cancer did Eddie Van Halen die from? - Quora

response.answer_text: As I am not a personal friend of his or anyone in his family, this is just based upon what I read. It seems as though it was some kind of tongue and throat cancer related to years of heavy cigarette smoking. If you smoke, quit. RIP EVH. You were rocking awesome.

Years ago Eddie Van Halen had a 1/3 of his tongue removed because of cancer, it eventually spread to his esophagus and then his lungs. He was a heavy smoker which is one of the main causes of this cancer.
